definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: Eight heavy think of is also, adopted the zhu ban shan suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 八重想想也是，采纳了朱半山的建议。

sentences.english: The report of the committee was accepted.
sentences.chinese: 委员会的报告已被采纳。

sentences.english: The committee ultimately adopted his suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 委员会最终采纳了他的建议。

sentences.english: However, the applications included no sex-based dosing recommendations.
sentences.chinese: 然而，该应用并未采纳性别区别用药量的提议。

sentences.english: On my advice, the Governor General has agreed to prorogue Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 总督采纳了我的建议，同意推迟国会。

sentences.english: Within the study area, Baihe Forestry Bureau land was classified into a two-hierarchy system.
sentences.chinese: 在数字化区划的森林经营类型中，二级系统被采纳。

sentences.english: The opinions of the participating experts and the situation regarding their adoption should be made public to society.
sentences.chinese: 专家论证意见及采纳情况应当向社会公布。

sentences.english: The third type does not have the sincerity of accepting criticism, only paying lip service.
sentences.chinese: 第三种人没有采纳批评的诚意，只是巧言令色。

sentences.english: If new strategies are required, companies must be bold enough to adopt them and change their organizations.
sentences.chinese: 需要新战略，就必须放胆采纳，把公司结构换掉。

sentences.english: He was able to persuade capital to adopt his plans.
sentences.chinese: 他能说服资方采纳他的计划。

sentences.english: New challenges are emerging for cloud adopters.
sentences.chinese: 云采纳者面临着新的挑战。

sentences.english: Personal letters written in a professional capacity today have adapted this affectation.
sentences.chinese: 今天，涉及职业能力的私人信件采纳了这种习惯。

sentences.english: Farmers' requirements on science and technology varied in different conditions.
sentences.chinese: 农民对采纳稻麦新品种的需求偏好不同。

sentences.english: She was advised to create some dolls with curlier hair, so she did.
sentences.chinese: 有人建议她制作一些头发比较卷的娃娃，她采纳了。

sentences.english: His proffer of advice was accepted.
sentences.chinese: 他提出的意见被采纳了。

sentences.english: In fact, the British Empire and its colonies did not use the updated calendar system until 1752.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，英国和他的殖民地直到1752年才采纳。

definition: to raise (an issue)/to propose/to put forward/to suggest/to post (on a website)/to withdraw (cash)
to solicit/to seek/to request (opinions, feedback etc)/to petition
to put into practice/to carry out (idiom)
to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
to report, requesting approval/written request for instructions
